About

P.N. Composite Ltd. is one of the leading textile manufacturers in Bangladesh, particularly. Through our continuous effort and commitment to product innovation and continuous improvement of the quality benchmark; whilst staying within the boundary of all environmental, ethical and safety regulations has always been our prime objective. We aim to take continuous strides in ensuring timely delivery of adminstaring state-of-the-art machineries to deliver quality products to our customers; at the same time – providing a world-class working environment for our employees – the same way we have been operating for more than a decade.

Click to download company profile

Type: pdf


OUR CAPABILITIES

We offer a complete solution to our customers regarding their textile and garment demand through our full range of equipments stretching from providing products from our knitting, dyeing, sewing, printing upto packing, providing a complete composite solution to our customers. We thereby pride ourselves in being able to serve our customers through “fibre to ready made garment solution”. Our specialty product and merchandising division in P.N. Composite Ltd allows us to have a better understanding of our customer demands and through our customer relation division we plan to continually provide support and satisfaction to our respective buyers and clients.
